text: Clarity is the debut studio album by Russian-German electronic music producer Zedd. It was released on October 5, 2012. A deluxe version of the album was released on September 24, 2013. The release of the deluxe album is preceded by the single "Stay The Night", which features Hayley Williams of Paramore. The album has mixed views from critics.http://www.spin.com/reviews/zedd-clarity- interscope/ ==References== Category:2012 albums
title: Clarity (album)
